EmailTemplate.name: 2018-02-09 DXC Executive Partnership Update.2-9-2018 Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and DXC Executive Partnership Update 02.9.2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Below please find our weekly Executive Partnership Update. This briefing will be sent weekly to update our key stakeholders on progress and key initiatives of the partnership. We published a joint video featuring interviews with Jim Haring, Greg Betz, and Casey Crawford. Please find the video here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/dxc-automation-turbonomic-customer-success-story/]]> and thanks to everyone who helped put it together! Any questions or comments, please reach out. Thanks,
Greg
